subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Cleveland's All-Star forward, accepted a five-year contract extension worth about $80 million from the Cavaliers, a huge relief for a rising team and its fretting fans who worried he might be planning an escape.
snippet: LeBron James, Cleveland's All-Star forward, accepted a five-year contract extension worth about $80 million from the Cavaliers, a huge relief for a rising team and its fretting fans who worried he might be planning an escape.
